channel.title: Torva Slots Broken
channel.description:

Helm: 20135 Body: 20139 Legs:20143

item.title: Torva Slots Broken
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?52501-PI-Fixing-Item-Equip-Slots-PI

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=496243.0

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/301201-pi-fixing-incorrect-item-slots.html

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/help/399327-item-going-into-wrong-slot.html

4 Links that I found within the first 5 minutes. I’m guessing you’re not going to look at them so I will spoon feed you.

  1. Open your itemassistant.java located server side.

  2. Search for this

public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) {
  1. Add this under that and change the “***" to your item ID (Ex: 20135 for your helmet case) and then change the "” next to “targetSlot =” to the target slot ID. (Ex: 0 for your helmet case)(IDs posted below)
	switch (wearID) {
					case ****:
						targetSlot = *;
					break;
}

So, this is what your helmet code will look like that you add under the code in step 1 in itemassistant.java, server side.

switch (wearID) {
					case 20135:
						targetSlot = 0;
					break;
}

All target slots

/*if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("cape")) {
					targetSlot=1;
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("hat")) {
					targetSlot=0;
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("amulet")) {
					targetSlot=2;
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("arrows")) {
					targetSlot=13;
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("body")) {
					targetSlot=4;
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("shield")) {
					targetSlot=5;
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("legs")) {
					targetSlot=7;
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("gloves")) {
					targetSlot=9;
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("boots")) {
					targetSlot=10;	
				} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("ring")) {
					targetSlot=12;
				} else {
					targetSlot = 3;
				}*/

Read full topic
